#title.title: Shifted Days
#title.content: This example shows how to shift day start times from midnight to 6PM.

.b-weekview .b-dayview-timeaxis-time.title: Midnight
.b-weekview .b-dayview-timeaxis-time.content: Midnight is just another time in the shifted day.

.b-calendarrow-header [data-header-date=.title: Spanning Day Column
.b-calendarrow-header [data-header-date=.content: Notice how day columns span two days.
